meanings.definition: The parts of lowercase letters that extend above the x-height, such as the stems of "b" and "d".
meanings.sent1: The ascenders on the letters make them look taller.
meanings.sent2: The calligraphy artist carefully crafted the ascenders on the page.
meanings.sent3: The ascenders on the letters were having a race to see who could reach the top first.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like the ascenders on a handwritten note.
meanings.sent5: The ascenders on the letters stood out boldly, demanding attention.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that ascends or climbs.
meanings.sent1: The mountain climber was a skilled ascender.
meanings.sent2: The ascender reached the top of the rock wall effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was a quick ascender up the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an ascender, propelling her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The ascender in the race was determined to win against all odds.
